About Me

I'm a software developer with a passion for crafting innovative and efficient solutions. I specialize in creating robust applications and delivering scalable and maintainable software. With years of experience in full-stack development, I thrive at the intersection of problem-solving, collaboration, and mentoring. My approach to development emphasizes best practices, continuous learning, and a focus on user-centric design.

Currently, I'm a Senior Software Engineer at ElevateGeo, specializing in geospatial solutions for clients in the transportation sector. I design and develop full-stack geospatial data systems and applications using TypeScript, React, and C#/.NET. Partnering with project managers and other stakeholders, I define requirements and design implementations that align with client objectives.

Previously, I've worked at Rizing Geospatial as a Senior Developer, Esri Canada as a Developer and Canadian Web Hosting as a Junior Programmer. I completed my Bachelor's degree in Computer Science after studying at Simon Fraser University and Langara College.

In my free time, I enjoy lifting, video games, and watching/playing sports.

Experience

Senior Software Engineer · ElevateGeo

2025 - Present

Design and develop full-stack geospatial applications for clients using TypeScript, React, and C#/.NET. Integrate and customize ArcGIS platform capabilities to support mapping, routing, and spatial data visualization. Develop RESTful APIs and backend services to support real-time geospatial data processing and analytics.

TypeScript React C#/.NET ArcGIS SQL

Senior Developer · Rizing Geospatial

2021 - 2025

Collaborate with clients to provide geospatial solutions for a variety of industries, including oil & gas and transportation. Create Python & .NET programs to manipulate and maintain client geospatial data. Work with project managers to define requirements and design implementations for client projects. Train and mentor team of junior developers on geospatial development and SOLID principles.

Python ArcGIS TypeScript C#/.NET SQL

Developer · Esri Canada

2019 - 2021

Developed and maintained web applications for clients using Angular/TypeScript. Wrote automation scripts in Python to aide team members in 3D building model digitization process. Utilized the ArcGIS API to build web applications containing 3D geographic models with interactive features. Collected data from external sources to create visualizations on top of 3D models.

TypeScript Angular ArcGIS Python C#/.NET

Junior Programmer · Canadian Web Hosting

2018 - 2019

Focused on front-end and back-end aspects of projects, from designing the layout and CSS of websites to managing databases and writing logic for applications. Leveraged knowledge in Full Stack web development, Git, algorithms & data structures, JavaScript, and debugging with Chrome Dev Tools.

Research
